title: Name variables
text: Let $$n$$ $$=$$ the first number and $$m$$ $$=$$ the second number.

title: Equations
text: We know the sum of the two numbers is $$-16$$, and that one number is $$20$$ less than the other. Using this, we can create two equations. One is $$n+m=-16$$, and the other $$n=m-20$$

title: Solve
text: Now, solve for $$n$$ or $$m$$, and plug it into the equation to find the other variable.
